org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.convert.xpath
Class AeBPWSToWSBPELXPathConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.convert.xpath.AeBPWSToWSBPELXPathConverter
public class AeBPWSToWSBPELXPathConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to convert BPEL 1.1 compatible xpath expressions into BPEL 2.0 compatible expressions.

Constructor Summary
private AeBPWSToWSBPELXPathConverter()
          Default c'tor.

          Converts a query from BPEL 1.1 syntax to BPEL 2.0 syntax (effectively drops the first step in the absolute path).

          Convenience method for converting an absolute loc path node to a relative loc path node.

convertExpression

public static java.lang.String convertExpression(java.lang.String aExpression,
                                                 IAeMutableNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext)
Converts a BPEL 1.1 compatible xpath expression to a BPEL 2.0 compatible format.

Parameters:
aExpression -
aNamespaceContext -

convertQuery

public static java.lang.String convertQuery(java.lang.String aQuery,
                                            IAeMutableNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext)
Converts a query from BPEL 1.1 syntax to BPEL 2.0 syntax (effectively drops the first step in the absolute path). If there is only one step, then this will return null.

Parameters:
aQuery -
aNamespaceContext -

convertToRelativeXPath

public static AeXPathRelativeLocPathNode convertToRelativeXPath(AeXPathAbsLocPathNode aAbsLocPathNode)
Convenience method for converting an absolute loc path node to a relative loc path node. This method effectively removes the first step in the absolute path.

Parameters:
aAbsLocPathNode -
